General.Name: Hyundai HT CoLtd
General.Description: Hyundai HT Co,Ltd. provides smart home and security services in Korea. It offers integrated home management, smart security, vehicle and courier arrival alert, energy use amount view, CCTV monitoring, elevator call, and vehicle location checking solutions. The company also provides Build Your Home, IoT, home, CCTV, and digital door lock products. In addition, it offers maintenance services for home network sites. The company was formerly known as Hyundai Telecommunication.Co.Ltd and changed its name to Hyundai HT Co,Ltd. in March 2021. Hyundai HT Co,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Hyundai Telecom Building, Seoul, South Korea
